thread.section_title: Brian Gavin Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brian Gavin Diamonds | briangavindiamonds.com
thread.title: Matthew Centeno
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Matthew Centeno

author: Matthew Centeno
title: Matthew Centeno
text: On March 3rd 2017: I had already been creating a plan of proposal for my beautiful girlfriend (now fianc√©) for nearly 4 months. The biggest hurdle was what kind of ring and what diamonds would "sparkle". With the help of Jamie at Brian Gavin Diamonds the result was incredible and unforgettable. Living in Alaska we do not have many options... however, I think there should only be one option when considering a ring, and that is with Brian Gavin Diamonds. I had been to Tiffany and Co. stores numerous times and thought those were the best until I received higher quality diamonds, setting, and ultimately customer service from Brian Gavin. This is the only jeweler I could recommend, and if you are like me who was contemplating on a Tiffany and co. Because of the name.... side by side this ring surpassed it in every way!
